<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Irkem Dresh](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1933)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 17</row>

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Banking Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +7, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +6, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[minor elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), fine clothes, [flintlock pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=192) (10 rounds), manager's keys

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 37

**Defying Glare** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature uses a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect against Dresh and fails or critically fails; **Effect** Dresh [Demoralizes](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) that creature; when she does, Demoralize loses the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait and gains the [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) trait and she doesn't take a penalty if the creature doesn't understand her language.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flintlock pistol +9 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [range 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing

**Generous Distraction**   Dresh can use the promise of wealth to distract her foes. When she succeeds or critically succeeds on a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) against a target within 30 feet, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against her ranged attacks as well as her melee Strikes.

**Silver Shower Shot** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** Dresh throws 2d6 silver pieces into the air, potentially distracting her target. Dresh makes a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) against a creature within 30 feet that can see her and which she can see. If her flintlock pistol is loaded, Dresh then makes a ranged flintlock pistol Strike against that target.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Dresh deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Irkem Dresh
